title: Which startups will be 2021 unicorns? - Quora

response.answer_text: As someone else has said, no one can know for certain. However, we can take educated guesses as to which startup companies have what it takes to become the next Unicorn by taking a good look at the current behemoths in the market and figuring out what they had back then that made them into what they are today. Here are three elements: A highly disruptive and scalable business modelThe vision to change the worldA capable and determined team of workers and executivesWith all of this said, there is a company which I believe has what it takes to become the next Unicorn of the financial markets. Its’ called Konzortia Capital, and it’s the holding of a fintech consortium made up of three companies that offer a wide array of innovative financial services that can change the financial industry as a whole. They intend to create a distributed ledger ecosystem for the entire financial industry to operate. Every person and institution will be able to access fast and secure online banking with support for any currency, digital or fiat. Small businesses will have a platform for borderless fundraising regardless of their size or jurisdiction. And all stock markets in the world will be integrated for users to trade and access wealth management services. Because this will take place within a single platform, users will have the ability to move their money seamlessly with no fees between banking, trading, investing and fundraising. If you want to find more about Konzortia you can check out their corporate site: konzortia.capital

No one knows. If anyone knew this answer then they would be incredibly wealthy. As a general trend I would still be looking at emerging tech companies because that is where most unicorns come from. Software as a Service or Platform as a Service companies have almost no overhead and if they have a popular product they have a near limitless growth potential as long as they keep delivering and improving their offerings.
